maggo\_ - (23/12/2008 14:20): Hi all, i manage a farm of Virtual xwikis and now i will use groovy code in my xwiki sites, i read that i have to give programming rights to the users or groups but i can't find informations on xwiki.org how to do this exactly, can you give me a link or an answare? thx  
asyd - (23/12/2008 14:39): maggo\_: it's in user or groups permissions (like read, write, etc.)  
maggo\_ - (23/12/2008 14:41): asyd: There is nothing like "Programming right" i can choose few things from the dropdown menu in Administration Panel but which one ist the right one?  
asyd - (23/12/2008 14:42): Users or Groups  
maggo\_ - (23/12/2008 14:44): asyd: i wanne give a group this privileges  
jvdrean - (23/12/2008 15:09): maggo\_: you can give the programming right to users/groups from the rights section of the administration. but \_only\_ from the main wiki.  
maggo\_ - (23/12/2008 15:10): jvdrean: you mean from the management instance?  
jvdrean - (23/12/2008 15:11): maggo\_: yes I think we're talking about the same thing  
jvdrean - (23/12/2008 15:11): the first wiki of the farm  
maggo\_ - (23/12/2008 15:15): jvdrean: sorry i don't think so, i have one wiki which is integrated to an LDAP all others not, in this wiki there is a group how will get programming rights for only this wiki  
jvdrean - (23/12/2008 15:16): you can't give programming rights to some users/groups only on a single wiki  
maggo\_ - (23/12/2008 15:17): jvdrean: hm bad, but in the main wiki i can't see anything on the group pages with programming rights  
jvdrean - (23/12/2008 15:19): this right appears only in the "Rights" section of the wiki Administration  
jvdrean - (23/12/2008 15:20): it's called "program"  
jvdrean - (23/12/2008 15:20): yourdomain.com/xwiki/bin/admin/XWiki/XWikiPreferences?editor=globaladmin&section=Rights  
maggo\_ - (23/12/2008 15:23): jvdrean: Ok this site appears, but where ist the normal way to this site? On my klicky way i couldn't find it till now  
jvdrean - (23/12/2008 15:24): Administration > Rights  
jvdrean - (23/12/2008 15:24): (not users or groups but \_Rights\_)  
maggo\_ - (23/12/2008 15:26): jvdrean: don't work if you're ill, ok i see it and its only in the main wiki, which reason is given to this  only for the main wiki? can i use it with my ldap groups  
maggo\_ - (23/12/2008 15:38): jvdrean: won't work, only if i logged in with superadmin i see the what i want  
jvdrean - (23/12/2008 15:42): it's a feature managed from the main wiki since it's a farm-wide permission  
jvdrean - (23/12/2008 15:43): you can use it with your ldap groups  
jvdrean - (23/12/2008 15:43): maggo\_: if you have to use the superadmin to see everything it is because the user you were using before don't have suffisant permissions I thing  
jvdrean - (23/12/2008 15:44): s/thing/think/  
maggo\_ - (23/12/2008 15:45): jvdrean: hm i mapped my LDAP Group in my virtual wiki to XwikiAdminGrooup and in this group is my user, the permissions on different pages via this mapping is ok because i can some pages edit and other not  
maggo\_ - (23/12/2008 15:46): jvdrean: do i have to map the groups also in the main wiki?  
xwikibot - (23/12/2008 15:54): XWiki.deepunix was modified by XWiki.deepunix (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/deepunix
